price: Nítorí náà, A ṣàforíjìn ìyẹn fún un. Dájúdájú ìsúnmọ́ (Wa) àti àbọ̀ rere sì wà fún un lọ́dọ̀ Wa.
arabic: فَغَفَرۡنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
